text: @piersmorgan YES!!!...Something z NOT Right!!They are forcing the 'herd' immunity  Onto Us,they are just going about it in roundabout 'deceiving Way!!They are playing GOD With Our Lives!..#I WANT TO BE TESTED NOW!MY LIFE MATTERS,AS MUCH AS THE RICH,Yet they say Covid19 don't discriminate#GOV https://t.co/8mptLPmy8J
